org.apache.ambari.server.api.resources

Interface ResourceInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryImpl

    public interface ResourceInstance
    Resource instance which contains request specific state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Resource.Type,String> getKeyValueMap()
      Obtain the primary and foreign key properties for the resource.
      Query getQuery()
      Return the query associated with the resource.
      ResourceDefinition getResourceDefinition()
      Return the resource definition for this resource type.
      Map<String,ResourceInstance> getSubResources()
      Return all sub-resource instances.
      boolean isCollectionResource()
      Determine if resource is a collection resource.
      void setKeyValueMap(Map<Resource.Type,String> keyValueMap)
      Set the values of the parent foreign keys.

    • Method Detail

      • setKeyValueMap

        void setKeyValueMap(Map<Resource.Type,String> keyValueMap)
        Set the values of the parent foreign keys.
        Parameters:
        keyValueMap - map of all parent foreign keys. Map from resource type to id value.

      • getKeyValueMap

        Map<Resource.Type,String> getKeyValueMap()
        Obtain the primary and foreign key properties for the resource.
        Returns:
        map of primary and foreign key values keyed by resource type

      • getQuery

        Query getQuery()
        Return the query associated with the resource. Each resource has one query.
        Returns:
        the associated query

      • getResourceDefinition

        ResourceDefinition getResourceDefinition()
        Return the resource definition for this resource type. All information in the definition is static and is specific to the resource type, not the resource instance.
        Returns:
        the associated resource definition

      • getSubResources

        Map<String,ResourceInstance> getSubResources()
        Return all sub-resource instances. This will include all children of this resource as well as any other resources referred to via a foreign key property.
        Returns:
        all sub-resource instances

      • isCollectionResource

        boolean isCollectionResource()
        Determine if resource is a collection resource.
        Returns:
        true if the resource is a collection resource; false otherwise
